decision_conditions:
<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following ap<span style="font-size: 14px;">proved plans </span><span style="font-size: 14px;">and documents:&nbsp;</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><span style="font-size: 14px;">101.HA85DN.001 REV A Site Location Plan, 101.HA85DN.003 REVA
(Elevations of canopy), 101.HA85DN.003 REVA (Floor Plans / Elevations), 101.HA85DN.003
REV B (Elevation and Floor Plans of Outbuilding)&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal;mso-layout-grid-align:
none;text-autospace:none"><span style="font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no windows / doors, other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in any elevation of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residentia<span style="font-size: 14px;">l use of the dwelling at 101 The Chase,</span><span style="line-height: 14.98px; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;">&nbsp;<span style="font-size: 14px;">Edgware, Harrow, HA8 5DN&nbsp;</span></span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><span style="font-size: 14px;">an</span>d shall not at any time be used for commercial purposes or as primary residential accommodation.&nbsp;</span>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
description: Use of outbuilding in rear garden as office ancillary to dwelling; canopy to rear extension of dwelling
